title: Content Chunk Ingested Event Schema
description: Schema for seed.content_chunk_ingested events emitted during lore ingestion phase

chunk_id.description: Stable identifier for the chunk from front-matter

tags.description: Array of canonical tags in category:value format

source_path.description: Relative path to the source markdown file

content_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of canonical chunk content (front-matter + body)

embedding_hint.description: Optional embedding hint (only when features.importer_embeddings enabled)

chunk_index.description: Zero-based index of chunk within source file for deterministic ordering

word_count.description: Word count of the chunk content for metrics

manifest_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the package manifest

source_path.description: Relative path to the source file within package

file_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the source markdown file
